PerfectNetExp.abs: 角龙(ceratopsian)类恐龙，化石发现于戈壁沙漠的晚白垩纪有8,000万年历史的沉积物中。原角龙属是更为人熟悉的有角恐龙(如三角龙…
角龙类（ceratopsians）主要生存于距今1.45亿至6500万年前的白垩纪。而最富盛名的便是三角龙。

means.word_mean: 1. any of several four-footed herbivorous horned dinosaurs with enormous beaked skulls; of the late Cretaceous in North America and Mongolia

auth_sentence.content: Early members of the ceratopsian group, such as Psittacosaurus, were small bipedal animals.
